title: Summer of Seventeen
description: It was supposed to be the endless summer of sand, sea, and surf.Supposed to be.But Nick Andrews’ life is crashing out of control. His girlfriend and his best friend have declared war, his sister’s constant interference in his life is driving him insane, and there are money problems that won’t go away.Being seventeen isn’t supposed to be this hard.When cool surfer Marcus arrives in town, Nick sees that there are easier ways to live. But with his life falling to pieces around him, it’s hard to know who to trust.As the scorching heat of summer grows, events begin to unravel, reaching a shattering conclusion—and a summer he’ll never forget.
author: Jane Harvey-Berrick
